title: Bronze Player's Looking For Some Fun 5v5 Action
body: HI i am in bronze 4 and kinda bored of getting crappy games in solo/queue so why not give 5v5 ranked teams a try, message back if you  want to play some teams

replies.body: im bronze 1 im down I main jg
im SIlver 4, add me on LoL MutantCser

I would love to but..... god dam i hate it when computers break and you can't play for like 2 years but.
Just saying I would be interested if my computer worked. I'm currently stuck in bronze with constantly getting lag spikes ect. and get teamed with the players who don't really care if they make you mess up and just blame it on you.I think team games would be different and fun. Hope you find a team some time (or quickly) Killer Out.
  
Btw posting from different computer i just got confused myself :P Killer Out (Again)
